x-code-samples.source:
curl -X POST "http://localhost:8000/api/login" \
    -H "Authorization: Bearer eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJpc3MiOiJod" \

    -d "username"=""engineer@mail.com"" \
    -d "password"=""password""

confirm_password.description: The password confirmation of the role.

x-code-samples.source:
curl -X POST "http://localhost:8000/api/register" \
    -H "Authorization: Bearer eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJpc3MiOiJod" \

    -d "role"="1" \
    -d "name"=""Ahmad Farid Imam Zamani"" \
    -d "email"=""engineer@mail.com"" \
    -d "password"=""password"" \
    -d "confirm_password"=""password""

curl -X GET -G "http://localhost:8000/api/role" \
    -H "Authorization: Bearer eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJpc3MiOiJod"

post.description: Add a new item on the role.

requestBody.description: Add a new item on the role.

x-code-samples.source:
curl -X POST "http://localhost:8000/api/role" \
    -H "Authorization: Bearer eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJpc3MiOiJod" \

    -d "name"=""Software Engineer""

curl -X PUT "http://localhost:8000/api/role/{role}" \
    -H "Authorization: Bearer eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJpc3MiOiJod" \

    -d "name"=""Software Engineer""

curl -X DELETE "http://localhost:8000/api/role/{role}" \
    -H "Authorization: Bearer eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJpc3MiOiJod"

curl -X GET -G "http://localhost:8000/api/employee" \
    -H "Authorization: Bearer eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJpc3MiOiJod"

post.description: Add a new item to the employee.

requestBody.description: Add a new item to the employee.

x-code-samples.source:
curl -X POST "http://localhost:8000/api/employee" \
    -H "Authorization: Bearer eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJpc3MiOiJod" \

    -d "role"="1" \
    -d "name"="Farid Zamani" \
    -d "salary"="15000000"

curl -X PUT "http://localhost:8000/api/employee/{employee}" \
    -H "Authorization: Bearer eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJpc3MiOiJod" \

    -d "role"="1" \
    -d "name"="Farid Zamani" \
    -d "salary"="15000000"

curl -X DELETE "http://localhost:8000/api/employee/{employee}" \
    -H "Authorization: Bearer eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJpc3MiOiJod"
